group_1.textLeft: You should've told me sooner that you were@just looking for Ria.
Way to waste my time.

group_1.textRight: Er, I'm sorry.
Uh...were we really the ones at fault?

group_1.textLeft: So, what did she do this time?
Are the narcissism cops after her or@something?

group_1.textRight: Narcissism?
Ria is actually very beautiful and charming.

group_1.textLeft: You forgot the word "unfortunate".

group_1.textRight: She's not unfortunate.
Now, now...
More importantly, what exactly happened here?

group_1.textLeft: What happened? Ria ate it all, that's what.
My precious brand-new rice omelet recipe@that I've been working so hard on!
Can you believe that?
I stepped away for just a minute.
A minute! And in that single moment, it was@gobbled right up!
Plate and all!

group_1.textRight: Wow... She must've been very hungry.

group_1.textLeft: Um...was it some sort of edible plate?
Not even! It was your average, everyday@plate!
But Ria, she'll eat anything.
No one's a bigger glutton than her!

group_1.textRight: Manaka, um, are you...
You're extremely angry right now, aren't you?

group_1.textLeft: Of course I am!
Do you know how much trouble I went through@to make that rice omelet?
And it was all ruined in an instant, so of@course I'm angry!

group_1.textRight: But Ria wouldn't eat a plate.
And I don't think she'd steal food either.
Anyway, did you even see her eating it?

group_1.textLeft: Now that you mention it, I didn't...

group_1.textRight: Aha!

group_1.textLeft: But no one was around when I left.
And when I came back, the rice omelet was@gone, but Ria was there.
So who could it've been if not her?

group_1.textRight: A Witch!

group_1.textLeft: Mayu, listen.
You can't just blame anything and everything@on Witches.

group_1.textRight: N-no, I have a good reason. Please hear me@out!

group_1.textLeft: So a book of secrets, a postcard, and a book@about swords have already been stolen?
But there were signs of Ria each of those@times, right?

group_1.textRight: Yes, b-but...there must be an explanation for@that!
It's hard for me to say this in front of@Mayu, but...
I still find Ria very suspicious.
She was spotted at each and every crime@scene.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed. And sword book aside...

group_1.textCenter: Beautiful things should belong to beautiful@people!
It's perfect for me, the stunningly gorgeous @Ria Ami!

group_1.textLeft: Or...

group_1.textCenter: If I used this to become even stronger and@even more beautiful...
Even the book itself would be happy to be@stolen!

group_1.textLeft: I bet she got all into herself like that and @took them.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]R-really!
Ria isn't that type of person!

group_1.textLeft: Okay, okay, that was just a joke.
But I definitely think Ria was the one@who stole my rice omelet.

group_1.textRight: The elegant and charming and mighty and@beautiful Ria...
She'd never do something as dirty as@stealing food just for a snack!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300902:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Wow... You really see her through@rose-colored glasses, don't you?

group_1.textRight: Ria is innocent! I'll prove it to you!

group_1.textLeft: Really?
Hmm, if you're that confident...
Let's say, if Ria isn't the thief, for an@entire month starting from today...
You can have anything on our menu for free.

group_1.textRight: Ria too?

group_1.textLeft: Sure. Bring as many people as you want!
Because I'm positive that she did it!
